column6: at covenant hospital. she requested to be cremated and the family will hold a private memorial service at a later date. she was born december 29
column9: oklahoma. she graduated from floydada high school and draughons business college. nadine worked in retail sales for hemphills and dillards for over 25 years
column10: retiring in 1995. nadine was one of the founders of flint avenue baptist church in 1953 and was a devoted christian all her life. she was active in united way for many years. she is survived by her son
column14: four grandchildren and six great-grandchildren. nadine was a gentle
column15: caring person and will be greatly missed by her loving family.
